name: Twist & Protect (ScoreJam)
description:
SpeedyMcTwist is   a racing AI with a legacy that needs protecting. This environment is the "Training Protocol".  This  program helps SpeedyMcTwist train so  it    can beat the records that the more modern AI's are setting. Help SpeedyMcTwist  PROTECT its legacy  from these new fangled AIs!

How To Play

Help Speedy McTwist get to the end of the track.  Press the "Twist" button any time you need to clear a gap to the next track.  When the Twist button is pressed, Speedy will flip up  and attach to the track above. 

Controller

Left stick - Movement Right stick - Camera   North  Button  (Switch : X, Xbox : Y, PlayStation :  Triangle)  - Twist

Keyboard

WASD - Movement  Arrow  Keys - Camera Spacebar - Twist

TriJam Submission:
https://itch.io/jam/trijam-154/rate/1376636
